title: [Empath Guild, Cloister]
description: Shadowy ivy vines across the limestone walls of a building forming the western side of the cloister, and climbing figs and leafy vines with tightly furled flowers meander about the columns which open onto the darkened garth.  A single rambling rose vine with blood red blooms frames a white door limned with stylized acantha leaf knotwork, matching a mosaic underfoot.

Ivy vines across the limestone walls of a building forming the western side of the cloister, and climbing figs and flower-filled leafy vines meander about the columns which open onto the garth.  A single rambling rose vine with blood red blooms frames a white door limned with stylized acantha leaf knotwork, matching a mosaic underfoot.
